title: 87: Dream Analysis with Lauri Loewenberg
itunes:title: 87: Dream Analysis with Lauri Loewenberg
description:
(TRIGGER WARNING: Miscarriages and loss of child are discussed) Ever wonder what your wild, frightening, sexual dreams mean? The Broads chat with Lauri Loewenberg (certified dream analyst) to discuss what is really behind your dreams. They discuss some of their personal dreaming experiences, common dreams, the purpose of dreams, and much more! 
LAURI LOEWENBERG:
Visit https://www.lauriloewenberg.com (https://www.lauriloewenberg.com/) to find out more about Lauri or book a personal dream analysis session.
DREAM ON IT: Unlock Your Dreams, Change Your Life by Lauri Loewenberg
https://read.amazon.com/kp/embed?asin=B004L2LH5U&preview=newtab&linkCode=kpe&ref_=cm_sw_r_kb_dp_kMtPDbPBZH0TG
